item.title: Samsung S8000 to Run Android, Play DivX, Take Over the World
item.description: More details have emerged on the first Samsung handset to run Android. A yet-to-be announced phone called the S8000 is being reported ...

item.title: Android Cupcake Update on the Horizon
item.description: After months of discovery and hearsay, the Android build that we have all been waiting for is about to finally make it out ...
